titles: An academy or colledge, wherein young ladies and gentlewomen may at a very moderate expence be duly instructed in the true Protestant religion, and in all vertuous qualities that may adorn that sex also be carefully preserved and secured till the day of their marriage ...
author: Chamberlayne, Edward, 1616-1703.
notes: Attributed to Edward Chamberlayne. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
